availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Estill County, Kentucky, laborer. Kentucky native. Son of John Rogers and Mary Rogers. Married to Rebecca Ann Smyth in Estill County, Kentucky, on May 9, 1860. Father of William Rogers Jr. and Drucilla Rogers. Resident in Estill County in 1850. Laborer in Estill County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 54A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 269.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lee County, District 5, Enumeration District 060, p. 499C.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Estill County Marriages, Film 000254628, p. 369.
